name: Ball'n'Can
description:
Welcome to the retro-styled shooter mini-game «Ball'n'Can». Here you need to shoot all the cans using the tennis ball! It's so retro that it even opens in a 1024x768 window!

Use the "A" and "D" (or left-right arrows) keys to move the target. When you think you have the right position, press "Enter" key to shoot the ball. Shoot all the cans to win. Remember: you have only 3 tries, or else you will lose!

If you win the level by using only one ball, you get strike! If with two, you get spare! Just like in the bowling.

  • The Classic: 10-can tower, great for tutorial!
  • Skyscraper: Giant tower, relatively easy to destroy!
  • Twin Towers: Althrough the seem unstable, they are not easy destructable
  • Giant Pyramid: It's, well, a giant can pyramid!
  • Can Wall: It's probably impossible to win this level!
